# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is RABBIT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
CHICK: Hello! Let's see if we can cooperate.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="80" multiplied_contrib="128.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="32.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> SNAKE=20,PINGUIN=20,CHICK=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"RABBIT (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_you":4,"payoff":36},"SNAKE":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":4,"payoff":36},"PINGUIN":{"coins_spent_on_reward":9,"coins_rewarded_to_them":0,"payoff":23},"CHICK":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":4,"payoff":36}}'/>
</ROUND>
